div.div:
Dan - February 15, 2012 - Kyocera Echo with version 13
Great app. Didn't remove Carrier IQ from my Kyocera Echo (2.3.4). But since I ...
Great app. Didn't remove Carrier IQ from my Kyocera Echo (2.3.4). But since I can read and think, using Root Explorer helped me remove it easily.

strumcat - June 25, 2012 - LG myTouch Q with version 13
Excellent
Just wanted to say thanks and express my satisfaction with this incredible app. Goes far beyond anything else I've seen to help you get rid of ciq and a whole slew of other security issues. Worked very well on my rooted LG myTouch Q (c800).

Brian - March 10, 2012 - Version 13
Thank you
US Cellular claims they don't have ciq loaded on any of their devices. It was on my HTC Hero S until this app. Thanks TrevE

bean - May 13, 2012 - HTC One X with version 13
no news
has this awesome project been abandoned? :(

alex - March 9, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 13
Amazing work!!!
Thanks for the new version. Works well and rid of the spies and the fbi. Dont down rank cause you can't follow directions on how to use it.

Nathan - March 20, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 13
Work in progress
While this app is not perfect, it is still a work in progress. I spent over a month communicating with the developer, Trevor, when I found several issues with this app on my Samsung Fascinate. He managed to fix every one of them, and he was in constant contact with me. This app provides a valuable service to anyone who values their privacy. Please, if you have a problem with this app, contact the developer before complaining and posting a bad review here. He did WAY more than 99 cents worth of work to get this app working for me. Every phone is different, and he doesn't have every single one available for testing and debugging.

Caboose - May 17, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 13
It worked
On my t-mobile gs2. i was worried that it took so long and was close to stopping the app but it pulled through. money well spent.

Rajaraman - June 15, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 13
Awesome
Worked like piece of Cake on my T-MOBILE Samsung Galaxy S2. Carrier IQ eats up ton loads of memory, I was able to save up words of 50-75 MB RAM by removing Carrier-IQ , good job.

rudy - May 13, 2012 - Version 13
no go on amaze 4g
states it removed carrier iq, however still there after reboot

ima - February 16, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 13
Fixed
Finally its back. I can say i am now enjoying my Galaxy S2 at peace. Thanks TrevE

Tom - May 31, 2012 - HTC myTouch 3G Slide with version 13
Amazing!!!
Thank you for all your hard work Treve! We really need to be more aware of android security and we definately need more devs like you! Keep it up!!!

David - April 12, 2012 - LG Optimus 2X with version 13
Absolutely awesome.
Works great, between this and my ad blocker there's no data going out that i don't want.

george - April 9, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy Nexus with version 13
Gn
Works on galaxy nexus....

Joshua - March 4, 2012 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 13
Works Great!!
MetroPCS Galaxy Indulge

Julian - February 9, 2012 - HTC Desire with version 10
Thank you for protecting us from evil corporations and their foul business ...
Thank you for protecting us from evil corporations and their foul business practises!

neclimber37 - December 27, 2011 - HTC Droid Incredible with version 9
Thku
Great work cleared the few spys I had. Need more devs keeping them in check.

Bret - January 1, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 9
Not to savvy when it comes to this stuff ..but with the help from ...
Not to savvy when it comes to this stuff ..but with the help from xda trev. not only am Is user also carrier iq free

Mike - January 8, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 9
Downloaded v9 from xda. It worked very well. Verified with Voodoo Carrier IQ ...
Downloaded v9 from xda. It worked very well. Verified with Voodoo Carrier IQ detector and Anti Carrier IQ that IQ is gone! Worth the .99 cents! EVO 4G

Shane - February 1, 2012 - SEMC Xperia Arc with version 9
Very funny well more odd then anything
It reads my phone to be a Lt15i when it's actually a Lt15a I have an Lt18i if any one wants to buy it condition is brand new white with a 3 year warranty .myxperia 88@Gmail

angel - January 11, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 9
Wooo
Worked!! Rooted EvO running Synergy Rls1 - verified before and after

david - February 2, 2012 - HTC EVO 3D with version 9
Error installing busybox
I was happy when I brought it but said when I got the error message. Garbage!!!!!!

The Crusher - January 13, 2012 - HTC Evo 4G with version 9
It gets the job done....thank you for creating this app!

Akasa - December 27, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 8.5
Thanks Trevor, you're awesome, worked perfectly in removing the main apk file. ...
Thanks Trevor, you're awesome, worked perfectly in removing the main apk file. CarrierIQ doesn't seem to be responding to user input anymore. EVO 3D

Jy - December 23, 2011 - Version 8.5
Works great on htc phones, but....
Works great on all of my androids except for my Epic Touch 4g. License says that it installs but the core app cannot detect it.

Don - December 22, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8.5
EVO 4G
Wrkd great! I thought I had it taken care of w titanium pro(freeze), but every 2-4pix taken the fone froze then rebootd like it was tryn to collect the pix, so I ran this app and fone is back to normal, which makes me think CIQ is spying on our pix also. BIG thanks to Trev.. U sir r awsome , support this Dev. He just saved our privacy.

Matt - December 24, 2011 - Version 8.5
Doesn't answer questions
I'm rooted but this doesn't work on my Sanyo & he doesn't respond to email. Too bad, seemed like a great product.

Max - December 13, 2011 - Version 8 *KeyFix*
license not authenticating
when the license was finally returned to the store, I successfully installed the APK v8 and then (supposedly) successfully installed the license on sprint samsung epic 4 g touch. went back to Logging Checker, remove CIQ, got the message "Thank you for the support but this option available to donators only!" WTH. 2 stars because I support what the DEV is doing, but this functionality is 0 stars.

Taurean - December 11, 2011 - Samsung Exhibit 2 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
Wonderful.
Dude, thanks do your applications, my Galaxy W has more ram, no glitches & better battery life.

bacon - December 19, 2011 - Version 8 *KeyFix*
awesome eat a D*%k carrier IQ
thank you trevE, Evo 4g was loaded with garbage......(ATTN)......Use all options on the pro version dont be skimpy (USE ALL OPTIONS).

Scott - December 18, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Doesnt seem to work on 4g touch
Donated money to get pro code. After updating to v.8 i installed the pro code but it fails to unlock. Might be a scam. Please be careful!

mhbr549 - December 10, 2011 - Version 8 *KeyFix*
Broken
New update is no longer working. I have newest version 8, and have rebooted. Fix this or refund me!

Getwired - December 15, 2011 - Version 8 *KeyFix*
Excellent. Dont forget to RUN the license app!
Works great on my Droid X w/ CM7 (RevNumbers). Successfully halted UsageStats and others. Cleans up adware and LocalStorage crap just fine. Good job Trevor -- happy to see what other cool features you come up with. Now to try it on my GTab 10.1 (rooted w/ Overcome v2.0.1 to make sure CIQ isn't there; dunno why it would be on a WiFi-only device, but I'm paranoid I guess)...

Adam R Oldfield - December 18, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
Good work!
Works perfectly everytime I flash a new rom. Evo 4g. Thanks!

Mr. Freeze - December 15, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
Thanks TrevE - Keep up the great work. Hate Corporate Bullies, Liars and Spys.. ...
Thanks TrevE - Keep up the great work. Hate Corporate Bullies, Liars and Spys.. Works on Rooted EVO 4G / Stock OTA 2.3.3 / BB 1.19.3

E.L.K. - December 10, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
New update fixed key and it works flawlessly!! Thanks so much, well worth a ...
New update fixed key and it works flawlessly!! Thanks so much, well worth a dollar!!!!!

Chris - December 12, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy Tab with version 8 *KeyFix*
Continues not to work on my galaxy tablet
License didn't unlock cleaning features Said I was ready to go and that key was installed,but nothing. Rebooted:nothing. Sux it's not working for me

Robert - December 18, 2011 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 8 *KeyFix*
Detected fine but....
App detected CarrierIQ on my rooted Galaxy S2 Skyrocket, but after removing the software and doing the mandatory reboot, I was stuck in an endless force close loop. Took a full CWM Recovery to get up and running.

Pax - December 21, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Didn't work > refund
After installing licence, still get message 'only for donated version' . Not able to remove adware and other malware. Samsung gs2.

Greger - December 17, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Want it to work
But main app still ask for donation... even after pro key was installed.

Chris - December 15, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Epic 4 g touch don't work
attempted this on my sprint epic 4g touch and like many it doesn't work don't buy this by mistake

Andrew - December 14, 2011 - Galaxy Prevail with version 8 *KeyFix*
Do not use on Samsung Prevail (BOOST MOBILE)
This application totally bricked my phone, so now I'm having to use a custom rom. :(

jon - December 10, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Bricked
Nice to know I had CIQ. Paid for the license and it bricked my phone. Had to odin in the stock rom to fix the issue. Using epic4g touch.

Anna - December 18, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
Froze up until I uninstalled the license...then worked like a charm.

Ronald - December 22, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 8 *KeyFix*
Not compatible work the epic touch 4g
please refund does not work with epic touch 4g sgs2

ShadyJ - December 14, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 8 *KeyFix*
Update
Works great once again after the update.

Brandon - December 10, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 8 *KeyFix*
Thanks
For the fix. It now works on the Evo 3D

douglas - December 13, 2011 - Version 8 *KeyFix*
bricked sprint epig 4g
do not install on an epic 4g rooted, it will brick the phone and require a restore.

avery - December 10, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 8 *KeyFix*
Thanks for fixing!!! Up to 5 stars now.

Brian - December 17, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Amazing
Worked perfectly. No more carrier-installed spyware for me! EVO4G

prospero63 - December 5, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
License not applying properly
Like others I'm having the same problems with the license applying properly. I've tried both v6 and v7 with the same incompatible results. I'm running an EVO 4G with the Synergy ROM and full root access. I contacted the developer and he responded briefly, but I have had no responses since then. I'm going to give it a day or so then try to get a refund...

talan1268 - December 5, 2011 - Version 5 *CMModFix*
Awesome App
There is a problem with the new version. I downgraded to the previous and the app works fine. I sent the dev an email to let him know.

Michael - December 4, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 5 *CMModFix*
Doesnt work
Followed instructions and still says i need to donate to use. How do u get money back?

alex - December 5, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 5 *CMModFix*
Lic key broke
Can't get app to go pro after buying pro key. Tried the instructions from xda site and here :(

Matthew - December 4, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Now key.
I reinstalled the v7 a couple times. Keeps sayin i need to install the key. I have... several times. I have the Evo 4g.

Patrick - December 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 5 *CMModFix*
Same thing with me, installed everything, still wont go pro, says cleaning is for ...
Same thing with me, installed everything, still wont go pro, says cleaning is for donaters only, wtf. Pls fix or refund or both!

Jay - December 5, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 5 *CMModFix*
Keeps asking to install license
Very annoying. Where's my $1

D - December 4, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Doesn't UNLOCK the feature
I followed the instructions and installed v7 then downloaded the license and installed. Reopened application and it still indicates that I need to install the license. How do I get my dollar back?

Carl - December 12, 2011 - Version 5 *CMModFix*
Duh
I followed the instructions and the program worked. Why is that so hard for some of you?

Marcin - December 6, 2011 - HTC Desire with version 5 *CMModFix*
Not working
Not working as many other people said before. Only for donators despite I paid for it.

gtrplr - December 4, 2011 - HTC Sensation 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Awesome
A+++ thanks for hard work

G-Unit - December 12, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
No More Carrier IQ!!
Removes the hidden malware the phone carriers secretly install!!!

Adam - December 4, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Garbage, no key.takes your money and nothing else.

Jorge "Bulgaro" Savoff - December 4, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G with version 5 *CMModFix*
Worth it
Much needed

Chris - December 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
A good app to TEST with. If you own a sprint samsung gs2 epic ...
A good app to TEST with. If you own a sprint samsung gs2 epic 4g, DO NOT use this app to remove carrier IQ!! It will soft brick your phone!

Vale - December 3, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Not working for me
I have a rooted Samsung Intercept with bROM installed. I purchased the key but when I try to install the license, it tells me "Error copying busybox!", then it says "all set!" but when i go try to remove CIQ, it tells me the feature is only for people who have purchased the key. Please tell me what I need to do to make it work or send me a refund, thank you.

Big Juan Teh Furby - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
I don't have CIQ, but here's $1 anyway!
Thanks ever so much for your tireless efforts into this garbageware. While my phone (luckily) doesn't have it CIQ, I'll happily give you $1 for the work you put into researching this and uncovering it for everyone to see.

Rew - December 3, 2011 - Galaxy Precedent with version 4 *CMModFix*
BusyBox Error
I thank you a ton for exposing this crap that's going on, and I wish I could get it working on my phone. My phone is definitely rooted, but after I purchased the key and tried to install it, I get an "error copying busybox" message and the pro features don't get unlocked. Any help from anyone would be greatly appreciated.

Adam - December 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Thanks
Perfect for doing what it says it's going to do. A little piece of mind and added security and privacy is totally worth a measly $1.

Andrew - November 16, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
PERFECT!
Removed everything i didnt want as intented. Well worth the purchase. HTC EVO Shift 4G running CM7 Nightlies

Patricks - December 3, 2011 - SEMC Xperia X10 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Purchased to Support the Developer and give thanks
As for this mess I don't think anything will come of it because of all the money that's behind Carrier IQ/ATT/T-Mobile and all the other investors/Data miners/Corporations/Software Developers and friends of all involved. The 55 million dollars in investments alone is a lot of hush money for the media/Bloggers. So they will all get on board for a awhile and wag their fingers to make it look good, all the law sues will quietly go away and they will change their names and go on to business as usual and just make it harder to find next time, because of the billions of dollars in data mining there is to be made. So Please rate 5 stars to this guy for his work trying to show us what is going on behind are backs. Although do you really think it will stop?? USA Inc. See what you get for your 2500 to 3500$ two year contract.

Liquid - December 2, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Nothing but an Error so far.
Says I need to install the latest version. Finally was able to. Still getting the same error. (Tmobile G2) Site needs a large button for DL, for ease.

CatsAreGods - November 30, 2011 - Samsung Exhibit 2 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
You, Mr. TrevE, are a God!
I have been coding and hacking for well over 30 years and I have rarely seen such a piece of work as this, especially as it was literally knocked out in days. Luckily there was hardly any nastyware installed on my Samsung Exhibit II from T-Mobile, just Google Checkin, which I was able to nuke thanks to your Pro Key addon. Thank you for your skills and outlook, it is a joy to support you and it's worth many times the meager cost!

Economics Majors - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Thank you
Bought for the support but I'm looking forward to security features. Keep up the good fight.

John B - December 1, 2011 - HTC EVO Shift 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Hey Trev, thanks for your efforts. I bought this justa show u some love. ...
Hey Trev, thanks for your efforts. I bought this justa show u some love. Please keep workin on it! I'll pay $10 for a SIMPLE app that removes CIQ!

Tyler - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Nothing but Error! messages
OK, so I downloaded the root software from the dev's website and then installed the Pro but all I get is an "Error!" message when I try to install the license. That and the app force closes every time if you hit the wrong button!

Skater - December 2, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 4 *CMModFix*
Worth it! - ATT Inspire 4G
Just put this on my att inspire 4g rooted with GB 2.3.5 sense 3.0 ROM from xda, great app install main app from xda then install this license. TY!

Shannon - December 2, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Unable to install Pro license on Sprint Intercept
I have a Sprint Samsung Intercept phone using Android version 2.2.1 and Kernel version 2.6.32.9 that is Rooted and I have installed version 7 of the Logging Test App. When I attempt to install the license key I get ERROR COPYING BUSYBOX! and then it says ALL SET! THANK YOU FOR THE SUPPORT! When I open the Logging Test App it is not the Pro version. HELP!

stowenrat - December 2, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
works
works fine with my Acer Liquid MT. Thanks. Only improvement would be a more slick interface but I aint complaining for £0.63.

Garr - December 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
Delivers but with a possible hitch..soft bricking
DO NOT attempt until you have backed up an image using ACSRecovery or something similar. It soft bricked my epic4g(ginger 2.3.5) after removing CIQ. Developer's site is down. Powerful, no doubt, but needs better interface with step by step instructions. Most people are acquiring it, I pressume, to remove CIQ, hence it should be displayed more prominently.

Costin - December 2, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Great work.
I use an AOSP ROM but i bought it to support the dev. and to be able to get back with confidence to stock rom.

Man - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Bricked my Sprint GS2 / Epic Touch
Used the removal tool and my phone won't boot now. Thanks? Lost access to all my internal SD files... not good.

jon - November 15, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
How to enable
Open pro key from market.....DONE! Then it will show as installed. Awesome app. TrevE works hard so we don't have to.

Les - December 2, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Great work!! I wish you all the best life can offer.

Vegas - November 15, 2011 - Kyocera Echo with version 4 *CMModFix*
Awesome
Been looking to slay IQ since I got the Echo. Best part is I charged it to my Sprint account.

Antonio - December 2, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Excellent
Well done Mr. Treve Greatly appreciated, I'm on for a sue to this company for tampering my phone without my authorization. We need to stop this.

Leo - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Can't download app
Tried with license and without getting 'fail' message each time on my Atrix2.

rickan - December 1, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Ran it on my HTC TMO G2
There was no CIQ, but I turned off all the logging and uploads.I'm pleased.

geoff - November 23, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Good luck
Great privacy tool. I hope my. $1 helps fight that CIQ mess.

Igal - December 2, 2011 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 4 *CMModFix*
Did nothing
Rooted my phone, ran app, ran voodoo carrier IQ detector and got same score (570, should have been 0 after running this app)

Bob - December 4, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Error copying busybox!
That error flashes up for a second, then I get 'All Set! Thank you for your support!' message, and obviously, the main app returns a "only available in pro version" even after rebooting. I'm on a VM Samsung Intercept, rooted with Z4Root. Please advise or refund, thanks. Update: It's been three days and I have heard no response from the author regarding my error. And of course, no refund. Downgraded to a single star and my undying disdain.

Phil - December 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
App doesn't work part 2
My phone is a rooted Samsung Galaxy S II Epic 4G Touch. It hangs on Galaxy S II boot screen! I had really high hopes for this app!

thomas - December 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
I can't install the apk package I am running it on samsung galaxy s ...
I can't install the apk package I am running it on samsung galaxy s , il let you know if Ifigure it out

Timothy - November 22, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 4 *CMModFix*
$1 well spent!
Thanks for giving me some privacy on my phone. If it says "only available in pro version" after activating, reboot.

Kyle - December 2, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 4 *CMModFix*
Thank you!
Appreciate all your hard work Trev and what you've done for the community

J.R. - December 1, 2011 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 4 *CMModFix*
Motorola Razr
Works awesome on the my new Motorola Razr. No threat or carrier IQ found!

Bonnie - December 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Downloaded fine but keep getting "error!" message when I try to "install license"? ...
Downloaded fine but keep getting "error!" message when I try to "install license"? Can't get it to work. HTC EVO 4G

Sinan - December 3, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 4 *CMModFix*
Absolutely flawless, installed perfectly and made sure I got rid of CIQ.

Shaun - December 1, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Well worth the buck! Get it!
Think because you're rooted HTC isn't phoning home? Think again. Powerful little app, and thanks to TrevE for his findings.

Michael - December 1, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Can't get it to work
Can't get it to work on my X2. I installed the free version, tried it out, works great. But when I click install for the key all I get is 'Error'.

Error copying busybox!
Did everything as instructed and pro version still not working on LG Optimus S with Reborn ROM. No dev response so far.

Andreas Suter - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Awesome App
Works as advertised. Simple. Thank you for bringing this issue to everyone's attention.

Franggio - December 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
No need
Well I don't need this but will buy anyway. Keep up the fight for our rights man. Or move to Sweden;)

Kevin - December 4, 2011 - Motorola Droid X2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Evil be gone!
Good to know that there is no evil on my Verizon Android phone. Apple & AT&T are both pure evil.

Adam - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Does what it says it does but..
removing IQ bricked my lg thrill (p925). luckily i did a backup before removing it. now im downloading this again to give it another shot (maybe removing one at a time and restarting in between) note: you have to visit the market on your phone to redownload this if you purchased it and it got deleted in a restore. EDIT: now it's not recognizing that i installed the pro license.

matt - December 4, 2011 - LG Optimus 2X with version 4 *CMModFix*
After last update
Tmo g2x froyo I am still receiving "ERROR COPYING BUSYBOX" and app won't update to pro version even after reboot

mikehd - December 4, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
Works perfect on my Captivate
Keep up the good work!

Steve - December 2, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
DO A BACKUP FIRST!
Removed CIQ on E4GT with stock ROM. Wouldn't boot past splash screen afterward. Had to Nandroid restore. Still gets a 5 and glad to support the dev.

Yourrolemodel - December 2, 2011 - HTC EVO 3D with version 4 *CMModFix*
I have the evo 3d. installed the tester showed carrier iq. then I installed ...
I have the evo 3d. installed the tester showed carrier iq. then I installed the pro key and deleted those pesky loggers. phone seems to run faster now

Jessica - November 17, 2011 - HTC G2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Happy to support...
And thanks for giving me a bit of privacy back... HTC G2 CM7 mod

BaKeDbEaN - December 2, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Kept getting errors
I had to restore, because of endless errors.Will purchase once updated LG Optimus Q L55C

J - December 2, 2011 - Motorola Photon 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
F*** YOU, CARRIER IQ !
Running stock MOTOROLA PHOTON 4G,just wanted to support the developer.Fortunately,my phone apparently does not have CIQ installed.

Brent - December 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Good work
Htc evo 4g, gonna root this week. F**k CIQ. I hope they keylog that.

Cary - December 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
Unable to install, message with "error" is all I get. No features of v7 ...
Unable to install, message with "error" is all I get. No features of v7 unlocked for Samsung Epic 4G on Sprint network. All methods to find and contact the developer have failed.

joshua - December 4, 2011 - HTC myTouch 4G Slide with version 4 *CMModFix*
Thanks
Helped me remove htc logger thank you and scan my ports and easy access to logs on my mt4gs Thanks trevE

dusthead - December 2, 2011 - HTC Droid Eris with version 4 *CMModFix*
Essential.
Didn't need it for my current phone, been rooted and flash for a long time. But may need it for future phones...and want to support!

Bille - December 3, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
Bille
I am unable to install the license on S Galaxy. Every time i click install license an error promp appears.

Chad - November 30, 2011 - HTC Thunderbolt with version 4 *CMModFix*
Thanks
Thanks for your work on CIQ and for giving us a way to remove it.

Nathan - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Bricked phone
Samsung Epic running Bansai based ROM, bricked after CIQ was removed.

Jesse - December 3, 2011 - HTC Incredible 2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Inc 2
R Trev just emailed me back. Were addressing the repeated errors.

Scott - December 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S with version 4 *CMModFix*
Stick it to 'em!
I'm not ready to root my phone, but here's a buck!

Benjamin - December 1, 2011 - Version 4 *CMModFix*
Bricked my Phone
Bricked my Epic Touch..... Complete bullshit.

Joseph - December 1, 2011 - Samsung Galaxy S2 with version 4 *CMModFix*
Thank you!
Supporting your efforts on this, unauthorized data and location monitoring should not be allowed on any device without consent.

Meeko - December 3, 2011 - HTC Desire HD with version 4 *CMModFix*
?
A small price for the knowledge my phone doesn't have C IQ on it (HTC Desire HD & Cm7)

Terry - November 27, 2011 - Motorola Droid X with version 4 *CMModFix*
Privacy advocates rejoice!
Perhaps LBE Privacy Guard will have some competition soon? ;) ... remember: ALL adware is malware

Clint - December 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Kept erroring out said to install updated version site to download from was down

Steve - December 1, 2011 - HTC Evo 4G with version 4 *CMModFix*
Worked great. 1 click removal of ciq! Thanks dev.

Rhonin - December 2, 2011 - Galaxy S2 Skyrocket with version 4 *CMModFix*
Skyrocket - Error
I on get a message saying Error and a comment install latest version, which is installed.....

Stephen - December 3, 2011 - Motorola Droid RAZR with version 4 *CMModFix*

Bricked my Epic 4G
Soon after this was released I installed it, purchased pro and was able to get pro license installed too. Found CIQ files, deleted them, and upon re-boot PHONE BRICKED to point I had to reflash ROM and load my Titanium Backup (Thank goodness for my nightly backups!). Use caution with this! I may try again but my last experience was aggravating to say the least.

div.p: I tried Using this and the v7 as the instructions said as other users tried as well. After purchasing I tried within the 15 minute refund window and saw it didn't work at all with the license and selected refund in the market place since the app and license couldn't work together.
